document.full_text: iraq's prime minister vowed on wednesday to punish those behind an attack on a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown in which 58 people were killed after gunmen stormed in and took hostages.
document.title: iraqi pm maliki vows to punish tikrit attackers
lines_and_colors: iraq's prime minister vowed on wednesday to punish those behind an attack on a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown in which 58 people were killed after gunmen stormed in and took hostages.
